name: Dot Blockchain Music, Inc.
description: Developer of a multiparty data management platform designed to track, communicate, and collaborate on changes to media data over the life cycle of an asset. The company's platform helps to replace the common music file types with a new file format that could be identified easily and could transform hard-code contractual and rights management data into an actual file when it is made, enabling clients to easily track down ownership, usage, payments, and rights without any hassle.
one_liner: Developer of a multiparty data management platform designed to track, communicate, and collaborate on changes to media data over the life cycle of an asset.
